title.rendered: 2 Days workshop on Facebook/ Instagram Marketing

content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”2 Days workshop on Facebook/ Instagram Marketing” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1594453264082{margin-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading nexa-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Best Suited for Business Owners, Working professionals in the Marketing and Technology sector.” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:16px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1589365917622{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Topics will be Covered:
• Understanding How Facebook/ Instagram Ads work.
• Understanding Ad Manager vs Boost Post.
• Making an impactful Ad on Facebook and Instagram.
• Lead Generation techniques
• Assignments and Case studies.

Read more


This is purely a Hand’s on course where you will be given practice assignments as well.

Support:
1. 5 days of email support available to answer the queries.
2. Consultancy Services available (charged separately).
3. The course will be interactive with Q&A slot included.

Payment Terms:
1. Advance Payment. Payment done will not be refunded.
2. In case you miss the lecture, it will be rescheduled as per the next available slot.

Prerequisite:
1. Have a good understanding of Facebook.
2. Good to have: Have tried Boosting Facebook Post.

Read less

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11265″ img_size=”400×400″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.instamojo.com/digitalconsultingpandit/2-days-workshop-on-facebook-instagram-market/?ref=store”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_btn title=”Register Now” style=”custom” custom_background=”#ff9f10″ custom_text=”#5d1d20″ shape=”round” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instamojo.com%2Fdigitalconsultingpandit%2F2-days-workshop-on-facebook-instagram-market%2F%3Fref%3Dstore||target:%20_blank|”]

Amount : Rs 8000.
Discounted Amount : Rs 3000 – For the first few registrations
Duration : 8 Hours (4 Hrs + 4 Hrs)

[vc_column_text]

Contact Us for more Details
